specializations.name: Bloodlust
specializations.description: A born warrior, who lives for the onrush of battle.

specializations.name: Keen Eye
specializations.description: An eagle-eyed hunter, finder of obscured things.

specializations.name: Unflinching
specializations.description: With nerves of steel, this guardian stands unbending.

specializations.name: Stealthy
specializations.description: Just a whisper on the wind, a mere flicker at the edge of vision, quick to the find, and quick to escape.

specializations.name: Thaumaturge
specializations.description: Ancient magicks snake in tendrils from the scholar's learned fingertips.

heroabilitytypes.description: Fearless in the fray, unshaken in the onrush, the unbowed strength of the guardian forges victory from daunting odds.
Not all magical arts destroy; the wise wizards also use their arcanism to defend and heal their companions, and negate enemy magicks.
Steadying the mind and drawing courage from comrades will steady the hands and draw battle lines more amenable to triumph.
Wise planning, sharp eyes, and preparation aforehand will annul and forestall the obstacles laid by both nature and one's foes.
Shrewd tongues, well-placed allies, and judicious use of arcane manipulation can ease both the strife, the journey, and the pocketbook.

heroabilities.name: Unbreaking Bulwark
heroabilities.description: Your blacksmiths have crafted reinforced shields, which your stoutest fighters wield to repulse even the mightiest blows.

heroabilities.name: Storm of Fire
heroabilities.description: Your mages conjure a whirling tower of flame, cowing the enemy minions into desperate flight.

heroabilities.name: Melt Steel
heroabilities.description: Searing blasts of arcane heat from your mages reduce enemy armor to dripping puddles, revealing the soft flesh beneath, ripe for the cutting.

heroabilities.name: Quenching Rain
heroabilities.description: Your shamans whisper stormwords, bringing great rainshowers to bear on the threatening flames. Soon, only wisps of steam remain.

heroabilities.name: Arcane Annulment
heroabilities.description: Energy barriers block the arcane energy, and the blasts bounce harmlessly back into the ether.

heroabilities.name: Dispel Magic
heroabilities.description: Your mages' guttural phrases send runic lightning blasting through the enemy spellshields, shattering the glimmering defenses.

heroabilities.name: Hymn of Courage
heroabilities.description: Your bards' strong voices waft in song over your troops, raising a bold chant to the skies, and bringing courage rushing back to wavering hearts.

heroabilities.name: Heroic Stance
heroabilities.description: Your champions plant themselves in fearless bearing, a sturdy example that bolsters your troops and grants fresh boldness.

heroabilities.name: Death Hath No Fury
heroabilities.description: One of your bards cracks a crude joke about the enemy, and the ensuing laughter cuts through the mental fog, revealing promise of great glory in battle.

heroabilities.name: Scorch
heroabilities.description: A quick-thinking mage wreathes you in a flash of fire that burns away all bindings, and leaves a nice new sheen on your armor, to boot!

heroabilities.name: Invigorate
heroabilities.description: Your commissary brings steaming draughts of sharp liquor, that burns all sluggishness away as it courses through your body.

heroabilities.name: Levitate
heroabilities.description: Your mages twist space-time briefly, pulling you up from the mire and allowing your company to float to solid ground.

heroabilities.name: Cushioned Saddle
heroabilities.description: Your sure-footed horses can pick their way through all dangers of the road, and your saddle's padding prevents soreness at the end of the bumpy day.

heroabilities.name: Friends In High Places
heroabilities.description: A quick missive to your cousin at court grants you a diplomatic visa, and a full refund for all tolls incurred.

heroabilities.name: Teleport
heroabilities.description: Arcanic stones are expensive, sure, but the portals you open with them to allow instantaneous transfers of supplies are still far cheaper than the price-gouging mule-train owners.

enemyabilitytypes.description: Overwhelming force cows all but the most stalwart, threatening to turn victory into defeat.
Neither blade nor bow nor buckler can stand against the ancient rites, and warriors' boldness turns to blanching retreat.
Sword and spell cannot avail once fear and doubt enter the mind, and fear of defeat makes defeat all the more certain.
Though courage flags not, both enemies and elements conspire to delay and impede, doing all they may to avoid or postpone the conflict.
Strength and steel alone do not win the war; blades do not swing without the backing of pay and provisions.

enemyabilities.name: Crushing
enemyabilities.description: This enemy rains heavy blows upon foes, demolishing armor and breaking bones.

enemyabilities.name: Horde
enemyabilities.description: This enemy has an entourage of footsoldiers, threatening to overwhelm any who approach.

enemyabilities.name: Armored
enemyabilities.description: Thick plates of sturdy metals deflect even the fiercest blows, giving blades no purchase and no hope of victory.

enemyabilities.name: Fireblast
enemyabilities.description: An explosion of flame and heat sears skin and turns armor from protecting shell to infernal entrapment.

enemyabilities.name: Arcane Storm
enemyabilities.description: The air glows and cracks with blue-white magic, and eldritch tendrils snake through metal and hide alike, lashing the life beneath.

enemyabilities.name: Rune of Aegis
enemyabilities.description: An impassable barrier of pure mana prevents all foes from approaching the caster.

enemyabilities.name: Intimidate
enemyabilities.description: The necklace of scalps, the blood-drenched blade, and the smoldering eyes signal that this enemy harbors great skill in battle, and no mercy for attackers.

enemyabilities.name: Reaving Shout
enemyabilities.description: A fearsome roar that somehow carries both physical and psychic force, chilling the hearts of all who hear it.

enemyabilities.name: Aura of Bones
enemyabilities.description: Death seeps in ashen strands from the fingers of this enemy, and foliage withers to dust as they pass.

enemyabilities.name: Web
enemyabilities.description: Sticky cords wrap around you, encasing your extremities in an entangling mesh.

enemyabilities.name: Torpor
enemyabilities.description: A heavy weariness seeps through your blood, and your legs become too heavy to lift. All you want is to close your leaden eyes and leave your toils forever.

enemyabilities.name: Quagmire
enemyabilities.description: The solid grounds suddenly gives way to sucking muck, that grasps at your legs and pulls you down towards its dark and inexorable depths.

enemyabilities.name: Rough Terrain
enemyabilities.description: These paths have seen no travelers for an age, and thick roots and vines obscure the sharp rocks and dangerous holes beneath. One wrong step threatens to snap bones and shatter equipment, and your staff balks without hazard pay.

enemyabilities.name: Toll Roads
enemyabilities.description: Your convoy passes through a foreign country with heavy fees for those who are merely visiting. Next time, maybe buy something while you're passing through!

enemyabilities.name: In The Sticks
enemyabilities.description: Your destination lies far from any supply depot, and you are forced to import supplies by mule, whose owners demand a high premium.
